summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 11th Ave. Southwest, west side only, from Southwest Spokane St. to Southwest Massachusetts Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by construction of storm drains and a sanitary sewer system together with outfalls and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19493 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
